title: Cyrillic version required...
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824151759im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ka2_6611.jpg)

Hi, I've scoured some of the net and have failed to find a cyrillic version of the font attached, (Blambot Casual Reg) or something incredibly similar. Would anyone have any ideas...?

Your help would be much appreciated.
author: Rand
